title: Paris sous la neige, vu du haut de St.-Gervais
marks: Signature LRC, in the print: [A. LEPERE (illegible)]; LRC be
description: high view over Paris with falling snow and snow on rooftops; Notre Dame in URQ; carriages, horses and people of bridge at left; boat on Seine at center; snow-covered roofs in foreground; black birds at left
